title: When to buy RoA
body: I'm not too sure what the optimal time is to buy Rod of Ages, it's expensive so I can't buy it early game, and usually I want to rush other items when I get 3k gold, so when exactly should I buy it, in terms of time and total gold amount? Is it just an item one gets for a bunch of stats when there isn't a specific need the team has because they aren't being opposed too hard, but still opposed hard enough to discourage getting a Mejai, or are there specific situations for when I should get one (For sustaining poke-heavy champs, when against tanks, etc?)

replies.body:
except for a handful of champs it is situational.

Don't make it a 2nd/3rd/4th item, decide to build it first to use catalyst early lane.
If you have a champ who is AP, require/emphasis on both HP and mana sustain and something to rush as the early game first item, then get RoA.

**You always want to complete a ROA before 18 mins or so since it takes 10 mins to fully stack up.**

Its usually the first complete item if you are building it.
Champions like Ryze usually build it after they buy a tear.

The catalyst is surprisingly good in lane. You will be amazed at how much healing it actually gives you when you level up.
The Blasting Ward isn't a bad purchase either if you want more damage if your slightly ahead.

**I usually go Blasting wand first if i think i can get a kill, or catalyst first if im just trying to farm out the early game.**

Champions who normally buy it are those who need mana, tankiness and AP {{champion:31}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:79}}

However others can build it too. I've seen {{champion:1}} {{champion:69}}  {{champion:30}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:76}}
I've never seen a Morgana build it, mostly because Zhonya's is so core.

Its almost always built as a first item if you're building it at all, since you have to wait 10 minutes after getting it before you're getting the full value. The passive from catalyst is also fairly useful for laning and activates more often in the early game when you are leveling up more frequently.
Depends on the case, if you can afford to go a Catalyst first (not likely to get a kill in lane) it's first item.

You could rush it on ryze if you are trolling

EDIT: Buy it after boots (finished), when you are in a semi ok position or falling behind
